message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I propose a 60/40 split. I'll take 60, and you get 40. It's a better deal for me considering the inflation. We can keep the game going and see what happens, but it's up to you.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to compromise a bit, but I still think I deserve a bigger share

This inflation is really hitting hard!  I'm willing to give you a slight increase from my last offer, but I think 55/45 is a fair split considering how much the money is losing value. What do you think?
Inflation is indeed harsh, but I still believe I can get a better deal. This is my new proposal
